mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY(CATE, TITLE, GOAL, CONTENT, WRITERID) VALUES(#{cate}, #{title}, #{goal}, #{content} , #{writerid})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDY WHERE 1=1 AND ( CONTENT LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') OR TITLE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') OR GOAL LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') ) ORDER BY SEQ DESC
